title: LAMBO Skyrockets 69,420% Amid Meme Coin Mania and This AI Dog-Coin Could Be Next
content: As meme coin mania continues to fuel hysteria in crypto markets, new Solana meme coin LAMBO token has skyrocketed +69,420%.
This article will provide an analysis of LAMBO’s current price trendsÂ and look to see whether an innovative AI crypto,Â SCOTTY, represents a more promising investment opportunity at this time.

Playing on the famous crypto meme ‘Wen Lambo?’, this novelty token has been received with enthusiasm in the crypto community – with explosive price action catalyzed by a Solana-based launch inspiring parrot launches across other chains such as BSC.
At the time of writing, LAMBO token is currently trading at a market price of $0.00665 (representing a 24-hour change of +208.44%).
This comes as LAMBO price leaps out of a well-defended consolidation down at $0.0045 – a move which saw more than 350 bag-holders hold tight despite a dramatic -31% retracement move.
Retracement was triggered following a historic high at $0.0088, a level which LAMBO price has since smashed to establish a new all-time high at $0.01.

The recovery has been fuelled by an influx of more than $102k in trading volume over the past 24-hours, and recent price action has left LAMBO with an alluring price chart in relation to its low market cap at just $655k.
Such a low cap could offer as much as 5-8x returns for late entrants investors, with confidence further buoyed by the strong display by holders amid retracement.
Yet, with just $40k in unlocked liquidity, meme coin traders should remain aware of the high-risk nature of this trade.
For traders and investors, a safer play could be emerging ahead of the Nvidia AI conference 2024 in Scotty the AI.
